attributes.action: STOP TONY BLAIR RETURNING TO BRITISH POLITICS
attributes.additional_details:
TONY BLAIR`s `LEGACY FOR THE UK IS NOT A HAPPY ONE,  RIDING THE WAVE OF A EUROPEAN WIDE GROWTH PERIOD, AND SPENDING THE COUNTRIES MONEY AT UNSUSTAINABLE LEVELS, AND ILLEGALLY TAKING US INTO TWO WARS WITH CATESTROPHIC RESULTS.
HAVING BEEN AWAY FROM THE UK LINING HIS POCKETS FOR THE LAST FIVE YEARS, TONY BLAIR NOW HAS HIS SIGHTS ON A RETURN TO BRITISH POLITICS .. LETS SAY NO ! ..
SIGN THIS PETITION TO DEMONSTRATE TO THIS PARIAH THAT HE IS NOT WANTED BACK IN BRITISH POLITICS !
